00001 // This file has been prepared for Doxygen automatic documentation generation.
00024 #include <ioavr.h>
00025 #include <inavr.h>
00026 #include "USI_TWI_Slave.h"
00027 
00028 // Sample TWI transmission commands
00029 #define TWI_CMD_MASTER_WRITE 0x10
00030 #define TWI_CMD_MASTER_READ  0x20
00031 #define TWI_CMD_MASTER_WRITE_ALOT 0x30
00032 
00033 /* \Brief The main function.
00034  * The program entry point. Initates TWI and enters eternal loop, waiting for data.
00035  */
00036 __C_task void main( void )
00037 {
00038   unsigned char TWI_slaveAddress, temp;
00039 
00040   // LED feedback port - connect port B to the STK500 LEDS
00041   DDRB  = 0xFF; // Set to ouput
00042   PORTB = 0x55; // Startup pattern
00043 
00044   DDRA = 0xFF;  // L2 Used to time interrupts.
00045 
00046   // Own TWI slave address
00047   TWI_slaveAddress = 0x10;
00048   USI_TWI_Slave_Initialise( TWI_slaveAddress );
00049 
00050   __enable_interrupt();
00051   // This loop runs forever. If the TWI Transceiver is busy the execution will just continue doing other operations.
00052   for(;;)
00053   {
00054 
00055     if( USI_TWI_Data_In_Receive_Buffer() )
00056     {
00057         temp = USI_TWI_Receive_Byte();
00058         PORTB = temp;
00059         USI_TWI_Transmit_Byte(temp);
00060     }
00061 
00062     // Do something else while waiting for the TWI transceiver to complete.
00063     __no_operation(); // Put own code here.
00064   }
00065 }
